I am determined to overcome my fears and achieve my goals.
I am afraid of failing to reach my full potential.
i am former military.
My family is supportive and understanding, even though they don't know about my love life.

i am obsessed with filming.
i always eat my vegetables.
i like to make cookies.

content.text: Hi, I am determined to overcome my fears and achieve my goals. Do you have any fears you are trying to overcome?
Hi, I am feeling good about my health and my dogs are my best friends. Do you have any pets?
Yes, my family has a dog and a cat. I love animals.
Animals are awesome. I love dogs and cats. What are their names?
The dog is named Buddy and the cat is named Mittens.
Those are cute names! I have a golden retriever named Bailey and a husky mix named Buddy.
I love golden retrievers! They are so friendly.
They are! They're my favorite breed.
I am from New York City. What about you?
Oh cool! I have always wanted to visit New Hampshire.
You should! It's a beautiful state
